ovdesc.p: To increase reporting versatility and marketability, T24 requires the ability to produce output from the ENQUIRY.REPORT suite in a generic XML format, and to perform XSLT transformations on the XML documents produced.

REPORT.TRANSFORM is the repository file for the XSLT transformations , allowing the T24 user to keep track of which transformations are to be used and allow the setting of destination and error paths for the report.
But the actual transformation is not done in T24 it should be handled by third party software.
